participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Alex loves to explore new experiences and meet new people. She has a playful side and enjoys attending parties.
participant_1.background: I enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. My parents taught me survival skills. I am also a graduate student. I walk dogs for a living. I'm an avid kayaker.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Introverted and imaginative, Jordan finds solace in the world of gaming and storytelling. He is sensitive and has a whimsical outlook on life.
participant_2.background: I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. I faint at the sight of blood. My dream in life is to work from home. I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i am deathly afraid of heights.
i am a party animal.
my favorite movie is mean girls.
i own a cat and a dog.
